title: Observation of the storage of ultra-cold neutrons in liquid helium.
abstract: We report the first observations of the storage of ultra-cold neutrons (UCN) in liquid Helium at temperatures approaching 1K. While the experimental results are such as to preclude a detailed comparison with theory we have demonstrated that UCN are actuallv stored in liquid Helium and our results are consistent with theoretical expectations

        We report the first observations of the storage of ultra-cold neutrons (UCN) in liquid Helium at temperatures approaching 1K. While the experimental results are such as to preclude a detailed comparison with theory we have demonstrated that UCN are actuallv stored in liquid Helium and our results are consistent with theoretical expectations.</dc:description><dc:date>
